description:
Kokorico Eau De Toilette - A Bold Statement of Masculine Allure

Experience the captivating essence of Jean Paul Gaultier's Kokorico, a daring and distinctive men's fragrance that commands attention. This 50ml Eau De Toilette embodies confidence and charisma with its unique cocoa-infused composition that stands apart in the world of masculine perfumery. âœ¨

The Essence of Kokorico

Named after the French onomatopoeia for a rooster's crow, Kokorico represents the ultimate expression of masculine confidence. Created by renowned perfumers Olivier Cresp and Annick Menardo, this woody aromatic fragrance delivers a powerful yet sophisticated scent profile that transitions beautifully from day to night. ðŸ”¥

Product Information
Size 50ml
Gender Men
Product Type Eau De Toilette
Concentration Medium
Brand Jean Paul Gaultier

A Symphony of Fragrance Notes

Fragrance Composition
Top Notes Fig Leaf, Raw Cocoa
Heart Notes Vetiver, Cedar
Base Notes Patchouli, Vanilla

Key Features of Kokorico EDT

  • Distinctive cocoa and wood composition ðŸŒ¿
  • Bold, statement-making bottle design inspired by a male torso
  • Medium-to-long lasting performance (6-8 hours)
  • Moderate sillage that leaves a memorable impression
  • Perfect for evening wear and special occasions
  • A best-selling fragrance for confident men

The Legacy of Jean Paul Gaultier's Kokorico

Launched in 2011, Kokorico represents Jean Paul Gaultier's bold vision of modern masculinity. The striking black bottle, shaped like a male silhouette, reflects the avant-garde design aesthetic that has made Gaultier a legendary name in fashion and fragrance. As one of the brand's most distinctive masculine offerings, Kokorico continues to captivate men who dare to stand out. ðŸ’Ž

This new arrival to our collection embodies the perfect balance of sophistication and boldness, making it an ideal choice for the modern man who appreciates unique cocoa-infused fragrances. Its complex character evolves beautifully throughout the day, revealing new facets with each passing hour. ðŸ’«

Frequently Asked Question

When is the best time to wear Kokorico Eau De Toilette?

Kokorico EDT shines brightest during evening occasions and cooler weather. The rich cocoa and woody notes create a warm, enveloping aura that's perfect for fall and winter months. While versatile enough for daily wear, this fragrance truly comes alive for dinner dates, nighttime events, and moments when you want to make a lasting impression. The moderate projection ensures you'll be noticed without overwhelming the room. ðŸŒŸ
